name: Hero Clicker
description:
Hero Clicker

Hero clicker is a mix between a clicker game and a rogue-like.

Items and relics

The game will feature over 50 items which will affect how the game plays.

Not just clicking to deal damage!

You'll be able to go various builds ranging from; auto clickers, lifesteal, thorns, skills etc.

Mercenaries to recruit

Along your journey you can recruit mercenaries, they can help you deal more damage.
They will be the auto clickers.
Besides mercenaries you can also get hero's after each boss.
These hero's act as a mix between auto clicker and items.

Each hero has their own abilities

Each hero features their own playstyle, they will each have 4 skills unlocked by leveling.
  • Rogue features faster skills and stamina instead of mana.
    Rogue has a higher base damage but lower health.
    Rogue skills range from damage to stealing gold.
  • Paladin features skills that heal him.
    Paladin starts with a lower base damage but higher health.
    Paladin skills range from damage to healing.
  • Mage features high damage and high damage dealing skills at the cost of health.
    Mage features a higher base damage but lower health.
    Mage skills have highest base damage in the game.
